12.content:
The time is 6:00 AM, and the place is an apartment near Chicago. The apartment has one occupant, a young woman who is sleeping in her bed. To most of the world she is Linda Danvers, college student. However, she has a secret known to only a few. Her other identity is Kara Zor-El, better known as Supergirl.

The alarm clock on the radio goes off. Linda wakes up and she ...
12.title: DC - Pre-Crisis Version

121.content: What kind of transformation did Supergirl go through?
121.title: While she was sleeping ...

1211.content: Did Supergirl become older or younger?
1211.title: Age

12111.content: Still half-asleep, Linda turns off the alarm clock and slowly gets out of bed. It was then that she noticed she felt different. Something was not right. She headed to the bathroom at super-speed. She looked herself in the mirror and gasped as she saw ...
12111.title: Older

choices: ... she hears a knock on the door.
121111.content:
Linda stared in shock at her reflection. Instead of a 20 year-old girl, she looked like a mature woman of about 40. Somehow, she had aged 20 years overnight.

How did this happen? she thought.

As she tries to figure out what has happened to her ...
121111.title: A mature woman of 40.

1211112.content: Linda heard footsteps followed by the door opening. She turned around and saw ...
1211112.title: ... someone enters the bathroom.

choices: She has shrunk to about 3 inches.
1212.content: What has happened (or is happening) to Supergirl?
1212.title: Size

choices: She fails.  She has lost her powers.
12121.content:
Linda’s eyes were still closed when she heard the alarm clock buzz. There was something odd about the sound, as if was louder. Must be my imagination, she thought as she blindly raised her left hand to turn off the alarm clock as she had done many times before. That’s strange, she thought as her hand struggled to find the alarm clock. I can’t even feel the table. More annoyed than concerned, she opened her eyes, and instead of seeing the ceiling of her apartment she saw a white sheet that completely enclosed her. She also discovered her brown wig wasn't on her head.

Linda slowly got up, and looked around her. There was light on one side of her. She slowly walked towards it. A very disturbing suspicion came to her. She reached the end of the covers, looked around and her heart raced as her fears were confirmed.

She was standing on her bed. It was larger to her than a basketball court. She looked back and recognized the nightgown that she went to bed wearing and just crawled out of. In front of her was the pillow and her brown wig. Both objects could now cover her body with room to spare. Her ears were bombarded by the nearly deafening sound of the alarm clock that was still buzzing.

There were two possibilities: she was still asleep and dreaming, or she had somehow shrunk. Her eyes searched the now gigantic bedroom. It was to her both familiar and alien at the same time. Using the bed headboard as a point of reference, she estimated that she was 3 inches high at the most.

It was then that she realized that she was naked. She was a little embarrassed at her current state, but not too concerned. She was the Girl of Steel, after all. She tries to fly to the alarm clock to turn it off.
12121.title: Supergirl's big problem.

choices: Try to get off the bed.
121212.content:
Linda tensed her muscles in preparation for flight, like she had done countless times before. This time, instead of soaring into the air, she stayed on the mattress. She tried again to break Earth's gravity, but again was unsuccessful. Frustrated, she bended her knees and jumped. She moved upwards a couple of feet (from her perspective), but then fell to the ground, landing on her rear end.

She looked up a the ceiling. Her concentration was impeded by the alarm clock which was still buzzing. The sound, annoying to her in normal circumstances, was now as loud as thunder to her. She gazed at it, intending to destroy it with her heat vision. The expected beams of heat from her blue eyes failed to materialize. The sound continued in mockery.

Concern was starting to turn to near panic. Linda went over to the giant pillow and tried to lift it. Despite putting her entire strength against it, the pillow wouldn't budge.

It was then that Linda realized she was in far bigger trouble (no pun intended) than she originally thought. She had been shrunk before, and there were times she was smaller than the 3 inches she was now. In those times, she still had her super abilities. It's different this time. Not only is she now the size of a mouse, she was just as weak and vulnerable.

For the first time in a long time, Linda was truly frightened. What do I do now?
121212.title: Supergirl's REALLY big problem.

choices: She changed to a male version of herself.

Did the Kryptonite meteor affect her?

Kara-Zor El, Post Crisis Supergirl.

Another version?

choices: Bulging gut blocking her feet from view. (Weight gain)
Fur sprouting from her skin. (Animal Transformation.
151.content:
Kara groaned as the morning sun hit her eyelids. Sure, she loved the sun for what it gave her in the form of her powers and therefore the ability to do great good in the world, but she had just spent the night partying with a few of her superhero friends and didn't enjoy being woken up just yet.

Still, it was hard for her to get back to sleep and so got up, only to realize that things were different than usual.

The most obvious change was the...
151.title: Post Crisis Kara Zor El

choices: Kara flies out to get answers and see this newly fattened world.
Luckily, Kara's outfit is able to fit her and she goes out.
1511.content:
Kara balked at the gut she was now sporting, reaching a hand out, which was also very fat, and poked in with a sausage-like finger. It sunk all the way in to the knuckle. Kneading it shortly afterwards, Kara let loose a mighty scream. Not loud enough to break all the windows in her apartment, but certainly louder than any human could yell.

Waddling towards the mirror, Kara got the first full look of her new body.

She was fat all over, not a single part of her larger than the rest. She was also, by far, the fattest woman she had ever seen, easily over five hundred pounds.

Testing herself, she lifted off the ground. Her eyes glowed red and she easily lifted the bed.

Okay, she thought, I've still got my powers, so I can still fight and help people.

But what would the world say about a suddenly fat Supergirl?

However, her thoughts were drawn from her current fat figure by her phone ringing.

Answering it, she heard her best friend Barbara Gordon, aka Oracle, on the line.

"Kara, have you seen the news?"

"No, but I'm not exactly my normal self."

"That's to be expected. Every woman in the world is now obese."
1511.title: Bulging gut blocking her feet from view. (Weigh...

1523111.content:
Okay so she's going to shrink but how?

Kryptonite has a laundry list of effects besides being able to kill her or turning her evil... maybe she comes into contact with some that shrinks her?
1523111.title: Little Kara

15231111.content: Okay cause decided, but does she encounter the size changing kryptonite as Supergirl, or as Kara?
15231111.title: Magic alien rocks away

152311112.content:
'Ms Luthor, are you sure this is safe?' Jess asks her as her boss sets up equipment to examine the blue gem like object found in the most recent of Lex's secret cashes. The artifact had been sealed in a lead lined box and only when inventory was being compiled did it get discovered. Once she heard Lena had it sent to L Corp and more importantly her office ASAP, as well as anything she'd need to properly examine and test the mineral.

'Yes Jess it's fine, there is a tiny amount of radiation leakage but it's less than a suntan so it'll be completely harmless' the scientist and CEO explained, hoping to calm her long suffering assistant, especially with all the recent activity that kept happening around here, she almost saw Supergirl more than her own assistant if that were possible.

'Yes Miss Luthor, just remember that if you miss lunch that reporter will make her frowny face and pout, seriously that pout should be outlawed' despite her complaint the smirk she as wearing made Lena happy her assistant was no longer at odds with her friend, that had been a big problem

Still that wasn't the issue at the moment, now was her newest problem from Lex, this one was actually quite beautiful for a change, sapphire blue and cut almost like a gemstone Lena almost didn't want to damage the thing, so she did the less evasive tests first.

The material may not be a real sapphire but it was of a high enough quality to be considered a gem, the material was also highly conductive, which gave Lena some ideas if they ever managed to find more of this stuff in some of Lex's other vaults/ hideaways,

Like she said to Jess the radiation was extremely low level and on a very low wavelength, it couldn't do damage to any human being, but given her brother was the previous owner there was a chance another species could be harmed by it, after all the Kryptonian's could be harmed by a green rock, why couldn't something else be harmed by a blue gem (Also green lanterns are harmed by yellow so DC is weird when it comes to colours). The radiation signature didn't match anything on record but she did manage to find a few signs the gem had been synthesized which was good news and bad news: On the one hand it being artificial meant she had no way of knowing what the thing could do or if Lex had altered it's properties, but on the other if she could determine it to be harmless she could make enough to test all those ideas she had forming in the back of her head, without breaking this sample/ gem cut piece.

The scans she had taken at least proved it to be a solid structure with no little surprises hidden inside in case of it falling into those her brother and mother would deem the wrong hands (like her own or the DEO's most likely) which was good seeing as one such surprise blew up one of her researchers a couple months back.

A knock at the door snapped her out of her musings and she realized Kara had arrived with lunch, she should probably save Jess from the pout, but first to place the gem back into it's box, Kara may be a good person but she was still a reporter and she can't really say to the blond something is 'off the record' if it's sitting the right in front of her. Ensuring the seal was on tight Lena finally opened the door and Kara scrambled in with bags of food, Jess glaring at her with a face that screamed 'You owe me SOOOO much' and it was true, Lena realized she really needed to give that girl a raise, not just for this but for everything else too.

How Kara could eat so much and still look the way she did baffled Lena, she didn't even eat half as much as the blond and she has had to add half an hour to her exercise routine since becoming her friend. Curse you Kara with your pouts and ability to find delicious cakes and other sweet treats.

Conversation flowed easily between them, some days actually reminding her of days before Lex turned out to be a psychopath, when it was just the 2 of them against the world, wanting to make everything better. Sighing at broken dreams she casts a gaze on her latest bit of recovered strangeness from the man, a gesture which did not go unnoticed by miss Danvers

'Hey Lena what you got there?' she asks, Lena not knowing she had tried to peak into the box, but the lead prevented her from knowing anything but the dimensions of the box itself

'You promise not to say anything back at CatCo? Lena asks, knowing Kara would never do such a thing but she was a paranoid woman who people were actually trying to kill, letting her have this piece of mind was the least Kara could do, and the young Kryptonian knew it too.

'Not until you either go public or mention it in one of our interview' she replies almost instantly making Lena smile

'Okay then' she grins and hops up to her desk 'I don't fully know the full capabilities of this thing myself yet but the possibilities are endless once the tests are completed and we can synthesize more of it' she explains with an near visible passion, she really wanted to turn something Luthor made into a force for good and this was one of many chances.

What she didn't know was that while Kara had been following her just as eagerly, no doubt feeding off Lena's enthusiasm, the moment the lid was removed she felt a stabbing pain in her brain and acute loss of her usually perfect balance. 'Shit' Kara swears internally 'Kryptonite!' she wonders how Lena could be unaware of how dangerous messing with that mineral was, and also what could happen to her if the DEO found out, but when she saw the blue glow coming from the box she understood: Green was the only really widely known color of Kryptonite, which makes sense given it was always green Lex used against Kal-El, the others being too unpredictable as far as Kara knew to be used effectively as a weapon, Lena simply didn't know Kryptonite came in a literal rainbow set, and it was coming back to bite Kara in the ass, hard.

The blond known as Supergirl panicked when the world started to both recede from her and shoot up above her, it turned out blue was capable of size manipulation, which was news to her (just because she knew there were many different colors of Kryptonite doesn't mean Kara knew what they all did) so she was forced to just stand a little behind Lena as she dwindled away to 4 inches tall, at which point the disorientation seemed to dissipate, it seemed her smaller body had reached the edge of the limited range of Blue Kryptonite, or at least of a piece that size. Staring up her friend was practically a goddess now, this was not going to be a fun day.

The question was, did Lena see any of that? Did she see the effect blue Kryptonite had on Kara?

1. She had been turned away at the time, so when she turns back to ask Kara that she thought the woman was 'gone' or at least that was how it looked (Kara has to try get her attention somehow)

2. She turned to ask her thought just as Kara began to shrink, the Kryptonian too disorientated to notice Lena watching her disappear, only when she reached a couple inches tall did Lena snap out of her daze/shock long enough to close the lid and stop the Kryptonite effecting her, because she realized what her brother had made, as well as what it does to certain aliens. (Lena has some more fun work to be done now ;D)
152311112.title: Tiny Kara Danvers

1523111121.content:
Although normally it would be a simple task for the mighty Girl of Steel to just fly up and yank a part of Lena Luthor's hair or something but since this was incredibly rare Blue Kryptonite who knows what other types of surprises awaited her? Her powers may have been temporarily erased or dampened so instead Kara began steady climbing the titaness with Lena of course being totally unaware.

Luckily she was as quick as a human as she was as a superpowered heroine!
"Just a bit further!" Kara told herself as she was close to Lena's.......
1523111121.title: Kara's 'disappearance'

15231111212.content:
Kara huffs as she reaches Lena's shoulder blade, glad her grip was still like a vice as the first part of her climb had been difficult due to the walking around Lena had been doing, though it did warm her heart the ravenette looked for her, another thing she was glad about was that she had managed to pass her hips and nearly reach her ribs by the time she finally gave up and went back to work (luckily not with the Kryptonite, Kara didn't want to get any smaller), she was unsure how much of her Kryptonian invulnerability she retained and didn't want to learn she was basically human by being crushed under the CEO'S ass, even if it wasn't that bad of a way to go in her opinion.

When she finally did reach Lena's shoulder she sprawled across it, for once Lena's laser like focus on her work, even the really boring business stuff, being a detriment as anyone else would notice something sitting on their shoulder. Sighing in annoyance Kara tried to think of the best way to get her attention without either being swatted or knocked off balance (such as pinching her or yelling in her ear)

What happens?

1. Kara decides to take a few strands of hair and swing off her shoulder, swaying until she was hanging directly in the centre of Lena's vision.

2. While thinking Lena turns her head and her hair whips around, slamming into the shrunken Super like a train. Kara falls off her shoulder into her open blouse, getting stuck in the older woman's cleavage. Kara at least got what she wanted though, as Lena DEFINETELY noticed that/her.
15231111212.title: Shoulder

152311112122.content:
'Fuck, what do I even pay these idiots for?' Lena thinks as she reads the barely intelligible paperwork that had ben sent to her, not helping the slightly sour mood she was already in from her best friend disappearing on her while she was telling her about her newest project. Sighing tiredly she turns to check the clock noting it was only 3 and continued to type

Meanwhile for Kara as she tried to think of a way to catch Lena's eye with as little potential harm to herself as possible she didn't expect her ground to shake as Lena slumps her shoulders in her sigh, unbalancing her and making it easier for the curtain of raven hair to whip through the air and knock her off her perch, Kara managing to hold in any screams she could have made as she tried to fly, silently cursing when she couldn't even slightly alter her position in the air any more than a human could, Blue kryptonite had stolen her size and her flight. This new information was enough of a distraction she didn't realise where she was about to end up until she landed with a bounce. She may be mostly oblivious to the emerald eyed woman's flirting but even Kara knew Lena had big perky breasts that she always showed a tasteful amount of cleavage with, whether it be at an event or just casual lunch with her, and those 'Kara attention seeking' alterations, namely a couple more buttons open than strictly necessary, meant rather than bouncing off her bust Kara slid into between then, getting trapped in Lena's cleavage.

There was absolutely no way for something like that to be stealthy, especially not for someone as sensitive as the youngest Luthor, so when her breasts jiggled like water balloons she knew something had happened, she didn't know what had but she knew it was something. Stopping her typing she reaches into her blouse, reminding herself she probably should have rebuttoned it at this point and pulled out the squirming this from her bosom, her eyes widen when she sees not only a tiny person, but one in particular 'Kara'

Kara groans lightly as she tries to regain her bearings, blinking the light out of her eyes she finds herself eye to eye with Lena, who after the shock had worn off Kara could see was very...
152311112122.title: Supercorp boobies

152313.content:
After using the Harun-El to separate Sam from Reign and defeating her, Kara and Sam began to wake up. At first everything seemed normal, but for some reason, Allura, Mon-El and Jo'nn looked at Kara strangely.

"Hey what's g-", Kara stopped as she heard her voice, it seemed so much younger.

"Supergirl?", Sam said, confused while looking at her.

Kara looked back at her, she seemed normal.

"What's going on?", Kara asked, standing up, then noticed she was much shorter. "Why are you guys so much taller now?". She then looked back at Sam, who also seemed her normal height compared to the others. "Why am I so small, and why wasn't Sam effected?"

"Calm down Kara.", Allura said, kneeling down to Kara's level. "the Harun-El can effect people different ways, it separated Sam from Reign, but it appears to have effected you quite differently."

"How?", Kara asked, a bit worried.

"Perhaps you should see yourself.", J'onn said handing Kara a mirror.

Looking at it, Kara couldn't believe what she saw, she couldn't have been any older than Ruby, she looked like she did when she first arrived on earth. "H...How do we fix this?"

After a moment of awkward silence, Allura responded. "We will find a way...for now we should return to your home."

"Alright, lets go.", Kara said then prepared to fly when
152313.title: age reverse

choices: Kara had lost some of her abilities
1523131.content:
Kara tried to leap up, to fly away, but she quickly fell to the floor, and felt a sharp pain in her hands. Looking at her palms, she saw that she had scraped them on the floor. "What's wrong with me.", Kara said looking around to her friends, with a worried look on her face.

"We'll have to run some tests when we get back, before we can figure out what that rock did you.", Jo'nn said, not wanting to worry her with his theory, that not only had the Harun-El separated Sam from her Kryptonian side, but it could have also separated Kara from hers. "For now you can ride with me.", Jo'nn then picked Kara off the ground. Moments later they flew off.

When they got back to the DEO, they discovered
1523131.title: She could not fly

15231311.content:
When they returned to the DEO, Kara was given a change of clothes, and was examined by Alex. Kara laid under the solar panels, hoping it would recharge your powers, while Alex performed a series of tests, while Allura sat nearby. After her fourth hour under the solar panels, Alex returned with the test results, removed the solar panels and allowed Kara to sit up.

"So what's wrong with me.", Kara asked.

"Well, nothing.....there is nothing medically wrong with you.", Alex said.

"Then why am I younger and why don't I have my powers?", Kara asked, getting worried.

Alex sat beside her sister, showing her a display of the test that were performed on her. "The reason you don't have your Kryptonian powers is because your not Kryptonian.", she then showed Kara a scan of her DNA,and according to it, you no longer have any Kryptonian DNA. "I can't find anything medically wrong with you, you are a perfectly healthy thirteen year old girl."

"But why am I thirteen, and what happened to my powers.", Kara asked.

"The Harun-El was able to split Sam from her Kryptonian side, it must have done the same for you.", Alex said.

"How do we reverse it.", Kara asked, looking at Allura.

"When I return to Argo City, I will see if I can find any way to reverse the effects.", Allura said.

"What do I do until then?", Kara asked, knowing she wouldn't be able to go out as Supergirl or go to work at Catco.

"Well you can always stay with me, or you can go back to Argo City.", Alex said.

You choose to
15231311.title: Kara was human

152313111.content:
In the past two months, very little had changed in Kara's condition. After Mon-El, Winn and Imra returned to the Future, Kara had moved most of her possessions into storage, taking only what she needed when she moved in with Alex. As far as Lena knew, Kara had decided to travel abroad for a while and was taking a leave of absence from Catco, and in the meantime, James and the DEO had been protecting.

So far, no matter how much time Kara spent under the solar panels, her powers would not return to her, and Alex could find no change in her now human DNA. They hadn't even heard back from Allura since her return to Argo City.

Sitting on Alex's couch, Kara typed on her laptop, sending Lena an update on her ''travels''. Spending a majority of her time in Alex's apartment, had become a bit repetitive and this was usually the highlight of her day. As she sent Lena a description of her so cold experience, seeing the Roman Colosseum for the first time, she heard the door open.

"Kara I'm home.", she heard Alex call out. Getting up, she walked over to the door, seeing Alex, holding a box of Pizza, some Pot Stickers and a few bag of groceries. "I got your favorite. You mind helping me with these."

"Sure.", Kara said taking the Pizza, while Alex placed the other bags on the kitchen counter, then the two of you put the groceries away.

"You know you didn't have to pick this stuff up....I would have been fine making something.", Kara said, as she moved a Pot Sticker around her plate with her fork. Ever since her change, even her eating habits had changes, usually she could eat a box of Pizza and Pot Stickers by herself, now she usually felt full after two of each, three at the most.

"It's fine, I thought you could use it.", Alex said with a small smile, happy to do this for her sister. Knowing it might be a while before she gets to be a mother,for now this was nice."I know, not being able to work or be Supergirl must be hard on you.". Alex then yawned.

"I guess it's about time for bed.", Kara said, feeling a bit sleepy herself.

"Yeah, probably a good idea.", Alex said, taking the left overs and putting them in the fridge, then went to do the dishes. "Good night Kara."

"Goodnight.", Kara said, then walked to Alex's guest room. As she began to fall asleep she was awaken by
152313111.title: Two Months Later

1523131111.content:
Hearing a loud explosion, Kara ran out of her room, to see Alex, preparing to go outside, and loading her gun, as the two of you could hear screams and destruction going on outside.

"What's going on?", Kara asked.

"That's what I'm going to find out.", Alex said as she holstered her gun.

"I'm going with you.", Kara said as she pulled on a jacket, then headed towards the door.

"No way Kara.", Alex said, stopping her.

"But-", Alex said, but was caught off by the sound of another large crashing noise.

"No, buts.", Alex said as she put on her shoes. "I know, you want to help, but you just can't right now.", Alex said putting her hand on Kara's shoulder.

"Just be careful.", Kara said, wishing she could help.

After Alex left, Kara quickly ran to the balcony to see the battle going down bellow, between DEO agents and some type of monster. Eventually Alex made it down there and joined the battle. Even James had shown up as Guardian. While they try their best, this monster refuses to stay down. Seeing Alex laying on the floor, with the monster coming towards her, Kara runs down to the streets, and towards Alex.

"Come on sis, get up.", Kara said, trying to help Alex to her feet.

"Kara I told you to-", Alex said tiredly before being cut off.

"I know, but even if I don't have my powers, I'm not just going to leave you to die." Kara said as she helped her sister away as fast as she could, while the beast continued to come after them. Unable to move very fast, Kara and Alex soon felt their bodies being thrown against a nearby wall. Kara hadn't felt like this since her fight with Red Tornado. Kara soon began to slowly black out, as the monster came towards them, but before she could she saw someone enter the battle, a woman, who appeared to use heat vision to blast straight through the beasts chest, killing it. Before she completely blacked out, she saw the woman's face.

It was
1523131111.title: An explosion outside

15231311111.content:
Slowly opening her eyes, Kara could see that she was back at the DEO, being monitored with Alex sleeping at her bedside. Sitting up, she felt a her head ache.

"Ah.", Kara said, as her head hurt, touching her forehead she felt a bandage. "What the-", she said but was cut off.

"Kara your awake.", Alex said enveloping her in a hug, "Don't ever do something that stupid again."

"It's ok Alex, im fine and-", Kara said as Alex let go of her, but was cut off.

"It's not ok Kara, you nearly got yourself killed.", Alex said, angrily. "I told you to stay in the apartment."

"I was trying to help you. You were going to-", Kara said but was once again cut off.

"You don't have your powers, and until you get them back, your just a little girl.", Alex pointed out.

"With or without my powers, I can't just let you die.", Kara said, then wrapped her arms around Alex.

Alex then calmed down and returned the hug. "I'm sorry, I just don't want anything to happen to you.", Alex said softly.

"I'm sorry too, I was worried about you too.", Kara said, then sat back down on the med lad table. "There's something else I need to tell you."

"What's that?", Alex asked, sitting down.

"After we were knocked into that wall...before I passed out, I saw the person who save us.", Kara said.

"Who was it?", Alex asked.

"It was......It was me.", Kara said.

"How is that possible?", Alex asked.

"I don't know, but it look just like me before I touched the Harum-El and it had all my powers.", Kara said, confused.

"Don't worry Kara we'll figure this out.", Alex said taking her hand. "I'll talk to J'onn and see if we can track this person down. Until then you should get some sleep."

"Good idea.", Kara said.

Kara wakes up
15231311111.title: Fully Grown Clone Kara

152313111111.content:
Opening her eyes, Kara saw that she was still at the DEO, but Alex seemed to have gone somewhere. Getting out of bed, Kara exited the med bay and went to search for her friends. It was still early, so there weren't many agents around. Kara eventually found Alex talking to J'onn about the events of the previous day.

"Knock, knock", Kara said playfully as she entered the room.

"Oh good Kara, your awake. I was just telling J'onn about what you saw last night.", Alex said.

"So what now", Kara asked.

"Well, now that we know what we are looking for, it should be easy to find your other half. Until then, you should go home and rest.", J'onn said.

"That sounds like a good idea, I'll take you home Kara", Alex said. "That sound good?"

"Sure", Kara said.

As the two of you left the DEO
152313111111.title: naturally the next morning

info.brief_description: A TF interactive involving the Girl of Steel.
info.description:
The Girl of Steel undergoes one or more TF (age, size, gender, etc.)

RULES

1) Don't kill off Supergirl
2) You can use any character in the DC Universe (Superman, Batman, etc) or you can have any original character.
3) Try to maintain the story line.
4) Beyond that, anything goes!
